BoolProperty.Name: VcpkgEnabled
BoolProperty.Description: Use Vcpkg for includes and libraries.

BoolProperty.Name: VcpkgEnableManifest
BoolProperty.Description: Use the vcpkg manifest file to define your dependencies.

BoolProperty.Name: VcpkgManifestInstall
BoolProperty.Description: Install dependencies from the vcpkg manifest.

BoolProperty.Name: VcpkgAutoLink
BoolProperty.Description: Enables automatic linking with libraries build using Vcpkg. Does not work with lld-link.exe.

StringProperty.Name: VcpkgRoot
StringProperty.Description: Root path where Vcpkg is located. Be careful with changing this one. It is, for example, unable to update this property page from the new location without restarting visual studio.

StringProperty.Name: VcpkgManifestRoot
StringProperty.Description: The path to the directory which contains the manifest file, and the vcpkg_installed directory.

StringProperty.Name: VcpkgInstalledDir
StringProperty.Description: The location where headers and binaries will be consumed from. In manifest mode, this directory will be created and populated based on vcpkg.json.

BoolProperty.Name: VcpkgUseStatic
BoolProperty.Description: Vcpkg can build static libraries (e.g. x64-windows-static). This options changes the default triplet to use these static libraries by appending -static to $(VcpkgTriplet). This will not be shown in the evaluation of the Triplet within the UI.

StringProperty.Name: VcpkgTriplet
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the triplet used by Vcpkg. Does not include the '-static' suffix that may be added by the 'Use static libraries' flag.

StringProperty.Name: VcpkgHostTriplet
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the host triplet used by Vcpkg. If empty, this will be automatically determined.

StringProperty.Name: VcpkgAdditionalInstallOptions
StringProperty.Description: Additional command line options to be passed to the underlying vcpkg tool when installing in manifest mode.

EnumProperty.Name: VcpkgConfiguration
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies if release or debug libraries build with vcpkg should be used.
